title: 8bit Music Loops Vol 1
description: 8bit Music Loops Vol 1 contains 24 high quality 8bit music loops (6 main tracks, plus 18 versions of them, including "No Drums" version). Music suitable for 8bit RPG and action video games, including: action, boss, menu, intro and game over tunes.
longDescription:
Preview: https://soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/sets/8bit-music-loops-vol-1-preview

8bit Music Loops Vol 1 contains 24 high quality 8bit music loops (6 main tracks, plus 18 versions of them, including "No Drums" version). Music suitable for 8bit RPG and action video games, including: action, boss, menu, intro and game over tunes.

The main tracks included and examples of use are:
- At the Castle Gate 0:55 (Menu, Intro)
- Crowning Day 0:49 (Intro, Action)
- Exploring the Surroundings 1:12 (Action)
- Facing the Enemy 1:25 (Boss)
- Imminent Battle 1:05 (Action)
- The Last Goodbye 0:54 (Game Over, Credits)

All tracks are perfectly seamless wave files at 44 KHz, 16 Bit and Stereo.

Please, let us know where you use any of these songs. We'll be glad to put a reference of your project in our web and social.

(8bit Sword image from https://www.iconfinder.com/megavyto98)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 24
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many minutes of audio provided: 14:29
Intended Platform: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus
